entry.title: websocket å®ä¾‹ï¼šegret ä½¿ç”¨typescript
entry.content:
ä½¿ç”¨egretå¼•æ“å¼€å‘websocketåªéœ€ç®€å•çš„æ·»åŠ å‡ ä¸ªäº‹ä»¶å“åº”å³å¯ï¼Œæ— éœ€æ‰‹åŠ¨æ·»åŠ çº¿ç¨‹æˆ–å¾ªç¯
ä»¥ä¸‹ç¤ºä¾‹åŸºäºegret5.2.13

class WSNet {
    //å•ä¾‹ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿ä½¿ç”¨
    public static Inst(): WSNet {
        if (null == WSNet._inst) {
            WSNet._inst = new WSNet();
        }
        return WSNet._inst;
    }
    private static _inst: WSNet;

    //websocketè¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
    private socket: egret.WebSocket;
    //æ„é€ å‡½æ•°
    constructor() {
        this.socket = new egret.WebSocket();
        //è®¾ç½®websocketè¿è¡Œæ¨¡å¼ä¸ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿è¿›è¡Œjsonåºåˆ—åŒ–
        this.socket.type = egret.WebSocket.TYPE_STRING;
        //æ·»åŠ æ”¶åˆ°æ¶ˆæ¯å“åº”
        this.socket.addEventListener(egret.ProgressEvent.SOCKET_DATA, this.onReceive, this);
        //æ·»åŠ è¿æ¥æˆåŠŸå“åº”
        this.socket.addEventListener(egret.Event.CONNECT, this.onConnected, this);
        //æ·»åŠ æ–­å¼€è¿æ¥å“åº”
        this.socket.addEventListener(egret.Event.CLOSE, this.onDisconnected, this);
        //æ·»åŠ ç½‘ç»œIOé”™è¯¯å“åº”
        this.socket.addEventListener(egret.IOErrorEvent.IO_ERROR, this.onError, this);
    }

    //æ”¶åˆ°æ¶ˆæ¯çš„å›è°ƒ
    private receiveCallback: Function;
    //æ”¶åˆ°æ¶ˆæ¯çš„å›è°ƒå¯¹è±¡
    private receiveThisObject: any;
    //è®¾ç½®æ”¶åˆ°æ¶ˆæ¯çš„å›è°ƒ
    public setReceiveCallback(callback: Function, thisObject: any): void {
        this.receiveCallback = callback;
        this.receiveThisObject = thisObject;
    }
    //è¿æ¥åˆ°æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä½¿ç”¨urlæ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œè¿æ¥ï¼Œå³æ ‡å‡†çš„websocketè¿æ¥æ–¹å¼
    public connect(url: string): void {
        this.socket.connectByUrl(url);
    }
    //æ–­å¼€è¿æ¥
    public disconnect(): void {
        this.socket.close();
    }
    //å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯åˆ°æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä¼šåºåˆ—åŒ–ä¸ºjson
    public send(obj: any): void {
        this.socket.writeUTF(JSON.stringify(obj))
    }

    //è¿æ¥æˆåŠŸ
    private onConnected(): void {
        egret.log("on connect");
    }
    //æ–­å¼€è¿æ¥
    private onDisconnected(): void {
        egret.log("on disconnect")
    }
    //æ”¶åˆ°æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä¼šå°†æ”¶åˆ°çš„æ¶ˆæ¯å½“ä½œjsonæ–‡æœ¬å¹¶è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå¯¹è±¡æäº¤ç»™ä¹‹å‰è®¾ç½®çš„æ”¶åˆ°æ¶ˆæ¯çš„å›è°ƒä¸­å»
    private onReceive(e: egret.Event): void {
        var jsonStr = this.socket.readUTF();
        if (null == this.receiveCallback) {
            return;
        }
        var jsonObj = JSON.parse(jsonStr);
        this.receiveCallback.call(this.receiveThisObject, jsonObj);
    }
    //é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†
    private onError(): void {
        egret.log("on error")
    }
}

entry.title: websocket å®ä¾‹ï¼šgo client
entry.content:
go è¯­è¨€ä¸­ websocket çš„å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ç¤ºä¾‹ã€‚
å…·ä½“çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç åœ¨ğŸ‘‰è¿™é‡ŒğŸ‘ˆ

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"github.com/gorilla/websocket"//è¿™é‡Œä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯ gorilla çš„ websocket åº“
	"log"
	"time"
)

func main() {
	//åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ‹¨å·å™¨ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ç”¨é»˜è®¤çš„ websocket.DefaultDialer
	dialer := websocket.Dialer{}
	//å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨å‘é€è¿æ¥è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œwebsocket ç»Ÿä¸€ä½¿ç”¨ ws://ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ç«¯å£å’Œhttpä¸€æ ·éƒ½æ˜¯80
	connect, _, err := dialer.Dial("ws://127.0.0.1/", nil)
	if nil != err {
		log.Println(err)
		return
	}
	//ç¦»å¼€ä½œç”¨åŸŸå…³é—­è¿æ¥ï¼Œgo çš„å¸¸è§„æ“ä½œ
	defer connect.Close()

	//å®šæ—¶å‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€æ•°æ®
	go tickWriter(connect)

	//å¯åŠ¨æ•°æ®è¯»å–å¾ªç¯ï¼Œè¯»å–å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€æ¥çš„æ•°æ®
	for {
		//ä» websocket ä¸­è¯»å–æ•°æ®
		//messageType æ¶ˆæ¯ç±»å‹ï¼Œwebsocket æ ‡å‡†
		//messageData æ¶ˆæ¯æ•°æ®
		messageType, messageData, err := connect.ReadMessage()
		if nil != err {
			log.Println(err)
			break
		}
		switch messageType {
		case websocket.TextMessage://æ–‡æœ¬æ•°æ®
			fmt.Println(string(messageData))
		case websocket.BinaryMessage://äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•°æ®
			fmt.Println(messageData)
		case websocket.CloseMessage://å…³é—­
		case websocket.PingMessage://Ping
		case websocket.PongMessage://Pong
		default:

		}
	}
}

func tickWriter(connect *websocket.Conn) {
	for {
		//å‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€ç±»å‹ä¸ºæ–‡æœ¬çš„æ•°æ®
		err := connect.WriteMessage(websocket.TextMessage, []byte("from client to server"))
		if nil != err {
			log.Println(err)
			break
		}
		//ä¼‘æ¯ä¸€ç§’
		time.Sleep(time.Second)
	}
}

entry.title: websocket å®ä¾‹ï¼šgo server
entry.content:
websocket å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯åœ¨httpä¸Šæ‰“äº†ä¸ªtcpçš„éš§é“ã€‚
å…·ä½“çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç åœ¨ğŸ‘‰è¿™é‡ŒğŸ‘ˆ

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"github.com/gorilla/websocket"//è¿™é‡Œä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯ gorilla çš„ websocket åº“
	"log"
	"net/http"
	"time"
)

func main() {
	//websocket çš„å‡çº§æ¥å£
	upgrader := websocket.Upgrader{}
	//go æ ‡å‡†åº“çš„ http å¤„ç†ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œå¤„ç†çš„æ˜¯æ ¹è·¯å¾„
	http.HandleFunc("/", func(writer http.ResponseWriter, request *http.Request) {
		//é€šè¿‡ upgrader å°† http è¿æ¥å‡çº§ä¸º websocket è¿æ¥
		connect, err := upgrader.Upgrade(writer, request, nil)
		if nil != err {
			log.Println(err)
			return
		}
		//ç¦»å¼€ä½œç”¨åŸŸå…³é—­è¿æ¥ï¼Œgo çš„å¸¸è§„æ“ä½œ
		defer connect.Close()

		//å®šæ—¶å‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€æ•°æ®
		go tickWriter(connect)

		//å¯åŠ¨æ•°æ®è¯»å–å¾ªç¯ï¼Œè¯»å–å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€æ¥çš„æ•°æ®
		for {
			//ä» websocket ä¸­è¯»å–æ•°æ®
			//messageType æ¶ˆæ¯ç±»å‹ï¼Œwebsocket æ ‡å‡†
			//messageData æ¶ˆæ¯æ•°æ®
			messageType, messageData, err := connect.ReadMessage()
			if nil != err {
				log.Println(err)
				break
			}
			switch messageType {
			case websocket.TextMessage://æ–‡æœ¬æ•°æ®
				fmt.Println(string(messageData))
			case websocket.BinaryMessage://äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•°æ®
				fmt.Println(messageData)
			case websocket.CloseMessage://å…³é—­
			case websocket.PingMessage://Ping
			case websocket.PongMessage://Pong
			default:

			}
		}
	})

	//go æ ‡å‡†åº“ç›‘å¬http
	err := http.ListenAndServe(":80", nil)
	if nil != err {
		log.Println(err)
		return
	}
}

func tickWriter(connect *websocket.Conn) {
	for {
		//å‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€ç±»å‹ä¸ºæ–‡æœ¬çš„æ•°æ®
		err := connect.WriteMessage(websocket.TextMessage, []byte("from server to client"))
		if nil != err {
			log.Println(err)
			break
		}
		//ä¼‘æ¯ä¸€ç§’
		time.Sleep(time.Second)
	}
}
